alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 26 at 1:59AM MDT until October 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West wind 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley and the southern hills and Albion Mountains. This includes the cities and towns of Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, and Almo. This advisory also affects the City of Rocks National Reserve. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
